position: Facctum | Ex-Barclays | AWS Certified Associate Developer | IIT Kharagpur (Batch of 2020)

experience.title: Graduate Analyst
experience.description: Managing Cloud Migration On-Premise Enterprise Data Applications to AWS Cloud andOpenShift Container Platform and achieved 33% reduction in support incidents and essentialAWS Services – ECS, EC2, S3, VPC, CloudWatch Enhancing capabilities of Java based Cucumber, Selenium Automation Testing Framework byintegrating complex Browser Actions, JIRA and Logs tracking, hence reducing manual effortsand time of 100+ testers thus achieving faster release deliveries Performing API Load Testing by leveraging J-meter to achieve API stability and hencereduction in Performance Incidents Advance Unit testing using Junit and Mockito for Java-based data platform services. Mentoring Junior Interns in converting business requirements to code and developed a tool toaudit test coverage done by testing teams
experience.description_html: Managing Cloud Migration On-Premise Enterprise Data Applications to AWS Cloud andOpenShift Container Platform and achieved 33% reduction in support incidents and essentialAWS Services – ECS, EC2, S3, VPC, CloudWatch Enhancing capabilities of Java based Cucumber, Selenium Automation Testing Framework byintegrating complex Browser Actions, JIRA and Logs tracking, hence reducing manual effortsand time of 100+ testers thus achieving faster release deliveries Performing API Load Testing by leveraging J-meter to achieve API stability and hencereduction in Performance Incidents Advance Unit testing using Junit and Mockito for Java-based data platform services. Mentoring Junior Interns in converting business requirements to code and developed a tool toaudit test coverage done by testing teams

experience.title: Software Trainee
experience.description: During my internship at Groww, I was responsible for developing a production-ready microservice in Spring Framework to track IP Addresses of app users. I was also responsible to analyze the behaviour patterns of investors using MySQL, BigQuery and Python.
experience.description_html: During my internship at Groww, I was responsible for developing a production-ready microservice in Spring Framework to track IP Addresses of app users. I was also responsible to analyze the behaviour patterns of investors using MySQL, BigQuery and Python. <!---->

experience.title: Backend and Data Analyst
experience.description: During my internship at Sqrrl Fintech Pvt. Ltd, I was able to create a python algorithm of SMS parsing using Natural Language Processing techniques and Feature Engineering. I analysed spend pattern of customers based on SMS data. I developed a Machine Learning Model to classify an SMS as debited or not. I also developed a javascript code to import and export data from an API to Google Spreadsheet.

Ltd, I was able to create a python algorithm of SMS parsing using Natural Language Processing techniques and Feature Engineering. I analysed spend pattern of customers based on SMS data.
